title: Did the President of the Federal Election Commission ask Trump to get evidence of fraud against voters, and to write your cards on the table?
subtitle: A remarkably open message, supposedly written by Ellen Wentrab to the President of the United States, was shared online in August 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The President of the United States Federal Election Commission, Ellen Wentrab, wrote an open letter to President Donald Trump in August 2019, asking him to share any evidence he had of voter fraud.
